properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 8:54PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warnings continue for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam...

.Rises continue along the Tombigbee River following the recent
heavy rainfall...and flood warnings remain in effect along the
river. Levels at Gainesville and Demopolis are currently forecast
to rise above moderate flood stage.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 8:30 PM Tuesday the stage was 109.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 101 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 113.5 feet by
early Friday morning then begin falling.
* Impact...At 109 feet...Flooding of some camps and cabins...as
well as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural
lands...occurs, especially upstream of the lock and dam.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
